# technitium_dhcp_reserved_lease (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "technitium_dhcp_reserved_lease" "test" {
  name             = "example"
  hardware_address = "00:11:22:33:44:56"
  ip_address       = "10.0.0.9"
  host_name        = "test-host"
  comments         = "This is a test reserved lease"
}
```

- `hardware_address` (String)
- `ip_address` (String)
- `name` (String)

### Optional

- `host_name` (String)
